record.description: Even in a big city like Chicago, boys are pretty much as they were back home. Having a "riot" are, left to right: Samuel Q. Spencer, Elmhurst, Illinois; Richard L. Williams, San Jose, California; Nevin L. Fidler Jr., Franklin Park, New Jersey; Jack Murdoch, Atlanta, Georgia; Gary E. Tegtmeier, Belleville, Illinois; and John J. McMahon, Douglaston, Long Island, New York.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Negative Included. Public Relations stamp. Photographer stamp. Caption attached.
record.noteCopyright: Credit: Archie Lieberman from Black Star.
